panelText.text: Ingrid submits her expense report and it initially goes through. However, during a later audit, her dishonesty is uncovered.
During this review, it is discovered that Ingrid took the client to dinner while the client was considering bids from competitors.

Ingrid’s manager makes it clear to her that appearances are important – especially during a bid process – and providing meals and entertainment during a bid could look like a bribe and may cause issues for Johnson Controls and any involved employee.
